abstract: BP’s incoming chairman, the former Ericsson boss Carl-Henric Svanberg, will lead a shake-up of the oil giant’s boardroom when he takes over, The Times of London reported.
snippet: BP’s incoming chairman, the former Ericsson boss Carl-Henric Svanberg, will lead a shake-up of the oil giant’s boardroom when he takes over, The Times of London reported.
lead_paragraph: BP‘s incoming chairman, the former chief at Ericsson, Carl-Henric Svanberg, will lead a shake-up of the oil giant’s boardroom when he takes over, The Times of London reported.

headline.main: BP Chairman Eyes Boardroom Shake-Up, Report Says
